p: The general purpose of amniotic fluid and fetal brain tests is to know if the virus can get through the placental barrier; microscopic placental examination to identify focal chorionic and/or calcific villi ( 30), and ultrasonography to get abnormal placental image ( 31). Amniocentesis for ZIKV detection, on the contrary, is largely suggested especially in case of asymptomatic fetuses despite lack of information about ZIKV predictive positive value and amniotic fluid molecular detection ( 31).
